clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of Inflammation of the lining of the nose and paranasal sinuses and allergic inflammation of nasopharyngeal

contraindications.disease: A large overdose or accidental oral intake especially in children may cause excessive sedation with drowsiness reduced body temperature heart rate relief and fluctuations in blood pressure and collapse
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Tymazoline is a drug with antihistaminic and sympathomimetic properties It locally reduces swelling inflammation and mucosal secretions of the nasal passages
